option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_language_toggle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:text="@string/language_toggle" android:textSize="12sp" android:minWidth="64dp" android:minHeight="48dp" style="?attr/materialButtonOutlinedStyle" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_welcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_toStartOf="@id/btn_language_toggle" android:layout_centerVertical="true" android:text="@string/welcome_to_alias" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@android:color/holo_blue_dark" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
</RelativeLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_teams_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/the_teams_are" android:textSize="20sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_add_team" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/add_a_team" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager" />
<com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/btnAbout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_info_details" android:contentDescription="@string/alias_how_to_play" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_empty" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="@string/no_cards" android:textSize="18sp" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_welcome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_to_alias" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="@android:color/holo_blue_dark" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_teams_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/the_teams_are" android:textSize="20sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_add_team" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/add_a_team" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/btnAbout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_info_details" android:contentDescription="@string/alias_how_to_play" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_language_toggle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:text="@string/language_toggle" android:textSize="14sp" android:minWidth="80dp" style="?attr/materialButtonOutlinedStyle" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_empty" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="@string/no_cards" android:textSize="18sp" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout>
